data.title: Loomis Bros. Circus 2024 Tour: Sarasota, FL - Aug 2, 3 and 4 - Robarts Arena
data.meta_description: Festivals.com - Friday, August 2, 2024 - Robarts Arena - AUG 2 @ 7:30 PM - AUG 3 @ 1:30, 4:30, and 7:30 PM - AUG 4 @ 3:00 and 6:00 PM - See A REAL 3-RING CIR ... click for more info ...
data.text:
AUG 2 @ 7:30 PM - AUG 3 @ 1:30, 4:30, and 7:30 PM - AUG 4 @ 3:00 and 6:00 PM - See A REAL 3-RING CIRCUS! ! 2 KIDS ADMITTED FREE Per Paid Adult. Get ready for a family adventure like no other as the Loomis Bros. Circus rolls into town in 2024. With a captivating blend of classic charm and modern thrills, this circus promises a mesmerizing experience for audiences of all ages. From their menagerie of exotic performing animals to the fearless daredevils, every act is crafted to create a collective sense of wonder and excitement. Bring the whole family and immerse yourselves in a world where the extraordinary becomes the norm, and the magic of the circus comes alive in ways that will leave you breathless. Loomis Bros. Circus is "Simply the Best"!

URL:

Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/2524047-0?pid=3698

Prices:

Adult (With 2 Kids Free): USD 30.00,

Additional Child: USD 8.00
